org.openbel.framework.common.lock
Class LockAdviser

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.common.lock.LockAdviser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Lockable
public class LockAdviser
extends Object
implements Lockable

LockAdviser is responsible for obtaining and releasing file locks for read and write access. The file locks are stored on disk at the specified lock path directory. This locking mechanism allows for multiple read locks to be obtained, but only one write lock.

Each unique lock path directory will have a single instance of lock adviser. LockAdviser is thread-safe which allows multiple threads to obtain and release locks from the same lock adviser instance without concurrency problems.

TODO Document Lockable implementations with LockAdviser-specific details. TODO Review and refactor if necessary. TODO Document fully once you're happy with the design.

Author:
Anthony Bargnesi <abargnesi@selventa.com>

Method Detail

instance

public static final LockAdviser instance(File dirPath)

obtainReadLock

public LockAdviser.Lock obtainReadLock()
Attempts to obtain a read lock from the target lockable.

A read lock cannot be obtained if the write lock has been obtained.

Specified by:
obtainReadLock in interface Lockable
Returns:
the read lock, or null if it could not be obtained

obtainWriteLock

public LockAdviser.Lock obtainWriteLock()
Attempts to obtain a write lock from the target lockable.

This will create a write lock file at lockPath that represents the write lock.

A write lock cannot be obtained if a read lock is held.

Specified by:
obtainWriteLock in interface Lockable
Returns:
the write lock, or null if it could not be obtained

releaseReadLock

public void releaseReadLock(LockAdviser.Lock lock)
Attempts to release a read lock from the target lockable.

This will remove the read lock file in LockAdviser#readLocks that represents the read lock.

Specified by:
releaseReadLock in interface Lockable
Parameters:
lock - the read lock to release from the target lockable, which cannot be null or have an invalid lock name

releaseWriteLock

public void releaseWriteLock(LockAdviser.Lock lock)
Attempts to release a write lock from the target lockable

This will remove the read lock file in LockAdviser#readLocks that represents the read lock.

Specified by:
releaseWriteLock in interface Lockable
Parameters:
lock - the write lock to release from the target lockable, which cannot be null or have an invalid lock name
